attributes.action: scrap the merge of stamford high with hartshead sports academy in tameside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due in Sept 2008 the local authorities have barged ahead integrating approx 100 yr 9 pupils from stamford into approx 1000/1200 pupils already at  hartshead regardless of pupils or parents concerns & are not willing to wait until 2010 when the 2 schools will merge into a newly built academy (the pupils did have a petition but it was taken away by the headmaster) & I don't think this a democratic move there was a meeting to voice concerns but we were told there was nothing we could do about it (it was a case of like it or lump it or move your child to another school) its big authority big bullies which according to the education authorities shouldn't happen in schools
